exceptions.tactic: destruct (InputHandler_cases h i (sigma h) u out st' ms H1) as [H7 | H7].
exceptions.exn: In environment num_Clients : nat h : Name i : Msg sigma : Name -> Data u : unit st' : Data out : list Output ms : list (Name * Msg) p : packet H1 : InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) H2 : locks_correct sigma H3 : locks_correct_locked sigma p H4 : pBody p = Locked The term "u" has type "unit" while it is expected to have type "InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (?u, ?out, ?st', ?ms)".

original: intros h i sigma u st' out ms p H1 H2 H3. unfold locks_correct_locked. intros H4. unfold locks_correct_locked in H4. intros H5. unfold locks_correct_locked. intros H6. simpl in H1. destruct (InputHandler_cases h i (sigma h) u out st' ms H1) as [H7 | H7]. - destruct H7 as [c [H8 [H9 [H10 [H11 H12]]]]]. exists c. rewrite H8. rewrite H9. split. auto. destruct H10 as [H13 | H13]. + destruct H13 as [H14 [H15 H16]]. rewrite H14. rewrite H15. auto. + destruct H13 as [H14 [H15 H16]]. rewrite H14. rewrite H15. auto. - destruct H7 as [H13 H14]. rewrite H13. rewrite H14. auto.
